name: taekbae
description: Korean parcel service tracking service for Node.js

scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R spec --require test/bootstrap/node test/**/*.spec.js test/**/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test: jshint --reporter=node_modules/jshint-stylish . && node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec --require test/bootstrap/node test/**/*.spec.js test/**/**/*.spec.js --timeout 30000

author: MooYeol Prescott Lee <mooyoul@gmail.com>
